name: CONCLUSE 2 DEMO (2022)
description:
It's almost here! It's been a long road but as we finally near completion of CONCLUSE 2 we wanted to release a new demo to show off some of the polish and new mechanics that have made their way into the game. A huge thanks to everyone that's stuck by us and is still looking forward to the next chapter!

Story

In Concluse 2, players once again take on the role of Michael Benson, a man searching for his missing wife.  After a terrifying journey through the town of Cordova in the first Concluse, you've finally arrived at your destination. It's been three years of searching and you're closer to finding Carolyn than ever before. Hell awaits..

Features
  • Updated combat system now with attack combos, blocking, and more integrated effects.
  • Revamped and polished low poly environments.
  • Combination of pre-rendered and in-game cutscenes.
  • Music composed by Clement Panchout.
  • Voice acting.
  • Full Xbox 360 controller support.
  • And much more..
Mature Content Warning

Concluse 2 is a disturbing game with uncomfortable and possibly triggering content.

Links
